entry.title: the reason why this blog exists
entry.id: http://example.com/2023/01/19/the reason why this blog exists/
entry.content:
Well, the reason why I built up this blog at the beginning is to prevent this domain name I just renewed from being wasted. And the reason why I bought this domain name at the beginning is that the first year of purchase only costs me about 20rmb although it costs almost 200rmb for the second year. For this domain name to always belong to me, I had to renew it.

Even though I think other Liu Sicuns living in china don’t necessarily need a domain name.

It may seem ridiculous and funny.

  • Firstly, because I am actually not good at writing at all. I think the pinnacle of my writing ability was in high school, in order to get a good grade in Chinese subject in the college entrance examination, in the last three months, our teacher even asked us to write an essay every day, of course for me it was just fabricating different stories because I don’t have so many stories worth writing in my life.

  • Secondly, I feel that my cogitation is not continuous enough to write a complete article, it is so chaotic and paradoxical, so it’s difficult for me to express what I think in words.

But hey, who says only good writers deserve a blog? I will write and post whatever I want to write, I don’t get any readers anyway. xD
